name: Kitty Cat Escapade
description:
Your ungrateful adoptive mom no longer wants you living with her, so you decide it's time to head off to the big city in search of your real mom. As you adventure through your suburban neighborhood you make new friends, collect cool items to assist you, and even face off against some bad guys. Watch out for those city alley cats and pesky sewer rats. Can you find mom? 

Works Cited:

gb studio defaults — https://www.gbstudio.dev
